original_text: But each of you should continue to live in the way that God has chosen for you. Remain as you were at the time when God called you to come to him. I teach that rule to people in all the churches.
korean_text: 오직 주께서 각 사람에게 나눠 주신 대로 하나님이 각 사람을 부르신 그대로 행하라 내가 모든 교회에서 이와 같이 명하노라

sentences.original_text: But each of you should continue to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희 각자는 계속 살아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: in the way that God has chosen for you
at the time when God called you
to people in all the churches
